definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is the largest inland saltwater lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的内陆咸水湖。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava2.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: So then we went to the Blue Lagoon .
sentences.chinese: 所以我们去了蓝色咸水湖。

sentences.english: But I've already bought a saltwater fly rod.
sentences.chinese: 但我已经买了咸水湖鱼鳔。

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is China's largest lagoonal.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的咸水湖。

sentences.english: Do you know Qinghai Lake, the largest salt water lake of China, is going dry?
sentences.chinese: 你知道中国最大的咸水湖青海湖正濒临干枯吗？

sentences.english: Qinghai the largest inland body of salt water in China, lies3198meters above sealevel .
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的内陆咸水湖，海拔3198米。

sentences.english: The Qinghai Lake is the largest saltwater lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的咸水湖。
中国最大的内陆湖泊和咸水湖。

sentences.english: The lagoon becomes fresh water and the mangroves die.
sentences.chinese: 咸水湖的水变成淡水，导致红树林死亡。

definition: inward flowing river/river flowing into desert or salt lake, e.g. Tarim river 塔里木河
inland river/river draining to inland sea
Qarhan Salt Lake in west Qinghai
Lake Superior, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Lake Victoria or Victoria Nyanza, Kenya, on the White Nile
Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
